did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Presbyterian Church of West Mendon records, 1831-1926.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Presbyterian Church of West Mendon (Honeoye Falls, N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Minutes of session meetings (1831-1875); minutes of annual meetings of the Presbyterian Society (1831-1925); incorporation certificate (1831); lists of members (1831-1888); records of baptisms (1831-1872); records of marriages (1831-1833, 1841-1842); records of deaths (1832-1870); lists of trustees (1903-1923)
